ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la cʉ́me nkʉ̀ wé mbwó Yelemî ntsẅìnkʉ̀ Ssé, nkʉ̀ ŋwɛ́ gwɔ́ gẅie é líe pʉ̀a Filisi, Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la cʉ́me wɔɔn nkʉ̀ ŋwɛ́ tá Falahoŋ láʼ ńkeme tÿǒsoŋo Ngázà né ncù.
en: This is the word of the Lord that came to the prophet Jeremiah about the Philistines   before Pharaoh defeated Gaza.  # 47:1 Am 1:6–7; Zph 2:4

ngiemboon: Anò gie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a gɔ̌ɔn, á yɔɔn:
en: This is what the Lord says:

ngiemboon: Mé ne ńjúʼu páʼ melúm melÿóon
en: At the sound of the stomping hooves of his stallions,
on account of the day that is coming

ngiemboon: Áa Ngázà metwó gwɔ́ me nzẅag, é gwɔ́ legwé.
Táʼ, ngwɔ́ yɔɔn nně ncù gÿo lêkɔ́ tá ńzẅɛte?
